org.apache.giraph.partition

接口 Partition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>

  • 类型参数:
    I - Vertex id
    V - Vertex data
    E - Edge data
    M - Message data
    所有超级接口:
    ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,M>, Iterable<Vertex<I,V,E,M>>, org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable
    所有已知子接口:
    ReusesObjectsPartition<I,V,E,M>
    所有已知实现类:
    BasicPartition, ByteArrayPartition, SimplePartition

    public interface Partition<I extends org.apache.hadoop.io.WritableComparable,V extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,E extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable,M extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable>
extends org.apache.hadoop.io.Writable, ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable<I,V,E,M>, Iterable<Vertex<I,V,E,M>>
    A generic container that stores vertices. Vertex ids will map to exactly one partition.

    • 方法概要

      方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明

      Add a partition's vertices
      long getEdgeCount()
      Get the number of edges in this partition.

      Get the vertex for this vertex index.

      Get the number of vertices in this partition

      Initialize the partition.
      void progress()
      Report progress.

      Put a vertex into the Partition

      Remove a vertex from the Partition

      Save potentially modified vertex back to the partition.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.apache.giraph.conf.ImmutableClassesGiraphConfigurable

      • 从接口继承的方法 java.lang.Iterable

    • 方法详细资料

      • initialize

        void initialize(int partitionId,
              org.apache.hadoop.util.Progressable progressable)
        Initialize the partition. Guaranteed to be called before used.
        参数:
        partitionId - Partition id
        progressable - Progressable to call progress

      • getVertex

        Vertex<I,V,E,M> getVertex(I vertexIndex)
        Get the vertex for this vertex index.
        参数:
        vertexIndex - Vertex index to search for
        返回:
        Vertex if it exists, null otherwise

      • putVertex

        Vertex<I,V,E,M> putVertex(Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex)
        Put a vertex into the Partition
        参数:
        vertex - Vertex to put in the Partition
        返回:
        old vertex value (i.e. null if none existed prior)

      • removeVertex

        Vertex<I,V,E,M> removeVertex(I vertexIndex)
        Remove a vertex from the Partition
        参数:
        vertexIndex - Vertex index to remove
        返回:
        The removed vertex.

      • addPartition

        void addPartition(Partition<I,V,E,M> partition)
        Add a partition's vertices
        参数:
        partition - Partition to add

      • getVertexCount

        long getVertexCount()
        Get the number of vertices in this partition
        返回:
        Number of vertices

      • getEdgeCount

        long getEdgeCount()
        Get the number of edges in this partition.
        返回:
        Number of edges.

      • getId

        int getId()
        Get the partition id.
        返回:
        Id of this partition.

      • setId

        void setId(int id)
        Set the partition id.
        参数:
        id - Id of this partition

      • progress

        void progress()
        Report progress.

      • setProgressable

        void setProgressable(org.apache.hadoop.util.Progressable progressable)
        Set the context.
        参数:
        progressable - Progressable

      • saveVertex

        void saveVertex(Vertex<I,V,E,M> vertex)
        Save potentially modified vertex back to the partition.
        参数:
        vertex - Vertex to save

      • getPartitionContext

        PartitionContext getPartitionContext()
        Get partition context
        返回:
        Partition context
